title: 2 raw t206 HOF Beaters for sale

posts.post_title: 2 raw t206 HOF Beaters for sale
posts.post_content:
I have two T206 beaters for sale or trade

Waddell  Uneven top edge multiple small creases SC 350 back $40.00

Willis  Creases small tear on right side Piedmont 350 back with paper loss HOLD

Shipping is on me and Paypal is fine.
In trade, I would consider anything pre-war.
                              Thanks,
                                Steve
